byline.contributor: Amy Chozick and Maggie Haberman contributed reporting.

abstract: Donald Trump criticizes Hillary Clinton's judgment at fund-raiser to help New Jersey Gov Chris Christie retire campaign debt, calling decisions she made that led to email scandal disgraceful; Clinton has had to respond to variety of criticisms from both Trump and her primary opponent Sen Bernie Sanders.
lead_paragraph: The presumptive Republican nominee was on hand to entertain the crowd by putting down the Clinton family and denouncing existing trade policies.

headline.main: Donald Trump Hosts Fund-Raiser to Help Chris Christie Pay Off Campaign Debt
headline.print_headline: Trump Raises Money for Christie; Clinton Is Hit on 2 Fronts

snippet: The presumptive Republican nominee was on hand to entertain the crowd by putting down the Clinton family and denouncing existing trade policies.
